Detailed Description

Client-callable DTS commands.

DTSCOMMANDS.C -- Client-callable DTS commands.

Author:
Mike Fitzpatrick, NOAO
Date:
6/15/09

int dts_hostAbort ( char *  host,
char *  passwd 
)

Just freakin' die.

DTS_HOSTABORT -- Exit the DTS without prejudice.

Parameters:
host host machine name (or IP string)
passwd DTS host passwd
Returns:
1 (one) if DTS responds.

References dts_closeClient(), dts_cmdInit(), and dts_getClient().
